Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 37th overall pick, by Montreal in 2017...
Traded from Montreal to St. Louis (B) on 3/2/2017 (Going to SLB: P Robert Gonzalez. Going to MON: 2B Free Agent Compensation)...
Injured on 4/19/2017 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Injured on 4/26/2019 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/31/2019 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Earned first career win on 4/7/2020...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/22/2020, off Roy Fisk (NY)...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/6/2020 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 6 weeks...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2020, going 19-8, 3.01 ERA...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2021...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2022...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,128,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/17/2023 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,321,429 through salary arbitration...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2024, going 6-1, 1.37...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/8/2024 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,321,429 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2025, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
9/21/2025: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (B), $14,500,000 per year, for 6 years.
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2025...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2026, going 4-0, 1.93...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2026...
Injured on 4/2/2027 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 4/10/2027 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 8/17/2027 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
